SEARCH
Package DAO

Class ClientDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.AbstractDAO<Client>
DAO.ClientDAO
public class ClientDAO extends AbstractDAO<Client>
This is a ClientDAO class that handles the database operations for clients. It extends the AbstractDAO class and inherits its methods. It uses the Connection class to interact with the database.

  • Method Details

    • doesEmailExist

      public boolean doesEmailExist(String email)
      This method checks if a client with the given email exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the client.
      Returns:
      true if the client exists, false otherwise.

    • doesPhoneExist

      public boolean doesPhoneExist(String phone)
      This method checks if a client with the given phone number exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      phone - The phone number of the client.
      Returns:
      true if the client exists, false otherwise.

    • isEmailOwnedByClientId

      public boolean isEmailOwnedByClientId(String email, int clientId)
      This method checks if the given email is owned by a client with the given id.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the client.
      clientId - The id of the client.
      Returns:
      true if the email is owned by the client, false otherwise.

    • isPhoneOwnedByClientId

      public boolean isPhoneOwnedByClientId(String phone, int clientId)
      This method checks if the given phone number is owned by a client with the given id.
      Parameters:
      phone - The phone number of the client.
      clientId - The id of the client.
      Returns:
      true if the phone number is owned by the client, false otherwise.
